org.apache.kafka.common.serialization

接口 Deserializer<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - Type to be deserialized into.
    所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    所有已知子接口:
    ExtendedDeserializer<T>
    所有已知实现类:
    ByteArrayDeserializer, ByteBufferDeserializer, BytesDeserializer, DoubleDeserializer, ExtendedDeserializer.Wrapper, FloatDeserializer, IntegerDeserializer, LongDeserializer, ShortDeserializer, StringDeserializer, UUIDDeserializer, VoidDeserializer

    public interface Deserializer<T>
extends java.io.Closeable
    An interface for converting bytes to objects. A class that implements this interface is expected to have a constructor with no parameters.

    Implement ClusterResourceListener to receive cluster metadata once it's available. Please see the class documentation for ClusterResourceListener for more information.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void close()
      Close this deserializer.
      default void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configs, boolean isKey)
      Configure this class.
      T deserialize(java.lang.String topic, byte[] data)
      Deserialize a record value from a byte array into a value or object.
      default T deserialize(java.lang.String topic, Headers headers, byte[] data)
      Deserialize a record value from a byte array into a value or object.

    • 方法详细资料

      • configure

        default void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configs,
                       boolean isKey)
        Configure this class.
        参数:
        configs - configs in key/value pairs
        isKey - whether is for key or value

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(java.lang.String topic,
              byte[] data)
        Deserialize a record value from a byte array into a value or object.
        参数:
        topic - topic associated with the data
        data - serialized bytes; may be null; implementations are recommended to handle null by returning a value or null rather than throwing an exception.
        返回:
        deserialized typed data; may be null

      • deserialize

        default T deserialize(java.lang.String topic,
                      Headers headers,
                      byte[] data)
        Deserialize a record value from a byte array into a value or object.
        参数:
        topic - topic associated with the data
        headers - headers associated with the record; may be empty.
        data - serialized bytes; may be null; implementations are recommended to handle null by returning a value or null rather than throwing an exception.
        返回:
        deserialized typed data; may be null

      • close

        default void close()
        Close this deserializer.

        This method must be idempotent as it may be called multiple times.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
